Name: Unity Testing Grounds
About the game: Simulation game that includes a collection of projects used to test Unity engine capabilities and bring gameplay concepts. This game showcase the Standard Assets Concept gameplay plus new multiplayer content. Features. -Simulation based game projects. -Different completion challenges for each project. -Benchmark capabilities and quality control for different configurations. -Cross platform version for Windows, Linux and Mac.
